entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
